DOCU_Docu.DOC:
Amazon EC2 functions
=Requirements=
On the executing agent the java and the Amazon EC2 API Tools must be installed and JAVA_HOME and EC2_HOME must be defined. Download Amazon EC2 API Tools from Amazon S3 https://aws.amazon.com/items/351?externalID=351
Info There is a bug with the revoke action and the cli in version 1.6.6.4. At the moment it is not possible to revoke the default egress rule via the cli tool. This bug is fixed 1.6.7
=Rollback=
The amazon AWS actions do not support rollbacks yet.
